context.description: A string indicating the root of your files.

emitError.description: The errors found will always be emitted, to disable set to `false`.

emitWarning.description: The warnings found will always be emitted, to disable set to `false`.

eslintPath.description: Path to `eslint` instance that will be used for linting. If the `eslintPath` is a folder like a official eslint, or specify a `formatter` option. now you dont have to install `eslint`.

exclude.description: Specify the files and/or directories to exclude. Must be relative to `options.context`.

failOnError.description: Will cause the module build to fail if there are any errors, to disable set to `false`.

failOnWarning.description: Will cause the module build to fail if there are any warnings, if set to `true`.

files.description: Specify the files and/or directories to traverse. Must be relative to `options.context`.

extensions.description: Specify extensions that should be checked.

formatter.description: Accepts a function that will have one argument: an array of eslint messages (object). The function must return the output as a string.

lintDirtyModulesOnly.description: Lint only changed files, skip lint on start.

quiet.description: Will process and report errors only and ignore warnings, if set to `true`.

outputReport.description: Write the output of the errors to a file, for example a checkstyle xml file for use for reporting on Jenkins CI

filePath.description: The `filePath` is relative to the webpack config: output.path

formatter.description: You can pass in a different formatter for the output file, if none is passed in the default/configured formatter will be used

threads.description: Default is false. Set to true for an auto-selected pool size based on number of cpus. Set to a number greater than 1 to set an explicit pool size. Set to false, 1, or less to disable and only run in main process.
